title: Chapter 1068 - I Just Happened To Be Passing Through
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1068 - I Just Happened To Be Passing Through

Clang!

The sword hum swept forth like the tides, instantly reverberating throughout the grand, silent hall.

Moonlit Shadow appeared like an ethereal streak of moonlight and landed in Su Yi's fair, slender hand. His wrists turned, and he thrust the sword into the air.

A perfectly straight rift tore open, and unstoppable, forceful sword qi scattered. It was like a swath of flowing light boring through the air and illuminating the entire hall.

The thin old man felt a chill course through his heart.

As a late-stage Profound Serenity expert of the Levitating Sword Hall, he’d overcome countless battles and immeasurable bloodshed. As soon as Su Yi thrust his sword, he sensed the danger.

There was no time to even think. The thin old man’s voice boomed like spring thunder as eye-piercing golden light burst around him. The terrifying power of the Laws swept forth like a tidal wave or avalanche. 

“Break!” The thin old man’s sleeves billowed around him, and a glittering golden Dao Sword shot through the air.

Boom!

Startling destructive energy fluctuations surged from the blade, like a golden sun descending from the heavens.

Dang!!!

An explosion reverberated through the...
original_title: Chapter 1068 - I Just Happened to Be Passing Through
